cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause security configuration errors and prevent proper ciphering setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid value 'invalid_level' will cause logging initialization failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 global_log_level 設定為無效值 'invalid_level' 會導致日誌初始化失敗。
